alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 7:12PM MST until August 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 800 PM MST. * At 712 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Summit, or near Sahuarita, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sahuarita, Green Valley, Drexel Heights, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, East Sahuarita, Tucson International Airport, Summit, Valencia West and San Xavier Mission. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
